name: Last Defense *Sega Megadrive/Genesis*
description:
History
Finally, the alien race known as Reptilians has decided to invade planet Earth to exterminate the human race.
Because during the time that humans are inhabiting the earth, the only thing they have done is pollute the planet and deplete its resources, extinct various animal and plant species without any remorse, as well as create a multitude of useless wars to obtain what they want by force.
For this reason, the Reptilians consider that humans are a very dangerous race for the rest of the worlds and the time has come for their extinction, for the good of the universe.
Your mission will be to prevent the invading reptilian ships from reaching Earth.




Installation
This is a shoot em up game for Sega MegaDrive/Genesis.
Download the binary file to use with an emulator of your choice, such as KEGA Fusion or BlastEm...but there are many more.
If you have a SEGA Genesis / MegaDrive and an EverDrive cartridge, all you need to do is copy the binary file to an SD card to play.
